segments.text: He then puts down the glass with his left hand
The long bearded man is repairing a light on the wall.

critique:
He doesn’t put down the glass; instead, he holds it with his right hand.
The young man is on the right and slightly behind the woman, not directly behind her.
He seems to be sitting, not half crouching.
The long-bearded man is not repairing a light on the wall.
